overview:
Mark Herbert provides over 20 years of experience in engineering management and system development.

Mark’s recent experience was with Cradle Technologies as VP of System Engineering leading teams in both US and India in developing world class Multiprocessor DSP solutions and applications. Prior to Cradle, Mark was an early member of Redback Networks as Director of SMS Hardware Development leading the team through the Internet build-out and subsequent IPO. Mark earned his BSEE degree from University of Illinois and an MS in Engineering Management from Santa Clara University.
